title: "It Has No Excuse to Be That Dull" - Top 5 Sci-Fi Films
itunes:title: "It Has No Excuse to Be That Dull" - Top 5 Sci-Fi Films
description:
Get the popcorn ready, the halflings are chatting about some of their favorite Sci-Fi movies, from little robots falling in love & tall dark-haired men all the way to backhanding Laurence Fishburne. Plus a truly wild tale from the table from our resident DM Jeremy Cobb.

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
